subject: Child Abuse and Neglect
College Athletics

Football
Sex Crimes
lead_paragraph: When the jury learned after its verdict that Jerry Sandusky’s adopted son had joined his accusers, “that was total confirmation that we made the right decision,” said one member.
snippet: When the jury learned after its verdict that Jerry Sandusky’s adopted son had joined his accusers, “that was total confirmation that we made the right decision,” said one member.
